summary.overview: This JCL job automates the opening of five critical business files in the CICS region to make essential transaction and reference data available for online processing. It uses SDSF to send CICS commands that open transaction processing, account data, cross-reference, security, and index files.
business_functions: Open TRANSACT file for transaction processing data access
Open CCXREF file for cross-reference information lookup
Open ACCTDAT file for account data information retrieval
Open CXACAIX file for account cross-reference index access
Open USRSEC file for user security information management

OPENFIL.jcl.program_overview: System Display and Search Facility - Executes CICS commands to open business files

datasource_summary.name: SDSF Program Results Output (ISFOUT)
datasource_summary.function: Stores output results from SDSF (System Display and Search Facility) program execution for system monitoring and job management purposes

datasource_summary.name: Command Execution Results Output (CMDOUT)
datasource_summary.function: Captures and stores results from system command executions for audit and monitoring purposes

datasource_summary.name: CICS File Open Commands Input (ISFIN)
datasource_summary.function: Contains CICS commands used to open various business files for transaction processing operations

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Records File (TRANSACT)
datasource_summary.function: Stores business transaction records for processing and maintains transaction history and details

datasource_summary.name: Cross-Reference Data File (CCXREF)
datasource_summary.function: Contains cross-reference and lookup data used for data validation and business rule processing

datasource_summary.name: Account Data File (ACCTDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Stores customer account information and account-related data for business operations

datasource_summary.name: Account Cross-Reference Index File (CXACAIX)
datasource_summary.function: Provides alternate index access to account and cross-reference data for efficient data retrieval

datasource_summary.name: User Security Information File (USRSEC)
datasource_summary.function: Contains user security profiles, access permissions, and authentication data for system security management
